contextId.occurrenceNote: This can be stated positively. Alternate translation: "he answered every question" (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/figs-doublenegatives]])
contextId.glQuote: there was no question that he did not answer

contextId.occurrenceNote: This can be stated in positive form. Alternate translation: "to make sure that only those who are clean could enter" or "to make sure only those who are acceptable to God could enter" (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/figs-doublenegatives]])
contextId.glQuote: so that no one that was unclean in any way should enter
